record.title: Redoubt C
record.descri: A map of Redoubt C drawn under the direction of Lieutenant Colonel V. Sheliha, Chief Engineer, Department of the Gulf by Newton Fitz, assistant engineer (hand-drawn).
record.subjed: Alabama--History--Maps.; Confederate States of America--Maps.; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Maps.;
record.contra: Map was drawn by Newton Fitz.
record.format: 20-1/2" H x 22-1/8" W; scale on map.
record.publis: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Library. Southern Historical Collection.
record.host: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
record.sponso: [Identification of item], in the Jeremy Francis Gilmer Papers #276, Southern Historical Collection, Wilson Library, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.
record.hardwa: Image was captured using a Horseman 4x5 studio camera with a Phase One PowerPhaseFX digital scanning camera back. Image was processed either with a Mac G4 or G5.
record.hardwb: Image was processed either with a Mac G4 or G5.
record.softwa: Image was processed with Photoshop CS2.
record.softwb: Image was processed with Photoshop CS2.

record.title: Plan of Battery McIntosh
record.descri: A map of the plan of Battery McIntosh, drawn under the direction of Brigadeer General D. Leadbetter (hand-drawn and colored).

record.title: Fort DeRussy on Red River, Louisiana
record.descri: The plans of Fort DeRussy and obstructions of the Red River below Fort DeRussy, drawn under the direction of Captain R. M. Venable (hand-drawn).
